item.title: Mining giant Glencore flew cash bribes to Africa via private jet, UK court hears
item.description: Mining giant Glencore flew cash bribes to Africa via private jet, UK court hears Corruption at FTSE 100 firm described as endemic at sentence hearingGlencore flew cash bribes to officials in Africa via private jet amid “endemic” corruption within the mining company, a London court has heard, in sentencing of the first ever UK corporate conviction on charges of bribing another person.
